Title: Batman: Gotham by Gaslight
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Crime, Fantasy, History, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: James Krieg, Brian Augustyn (graphic novel: "Gotham by Gaslight"), Mike Mignola (graphic novel: "Gotham by Gaslight"), Bob Kane (Batman created by), Bill Finger (Batman created by), Denny O'Neil (Leslie Thompkins created by), Dick Giordano (Leslie Thompkins created by)
Actors: Bruce Greenwood, Jennifer Carpenter, Chris Cox, John DiMaggio
Plot: In an alternative Victorian Age Gotham City, Batman begins his war on crime while he investigates a new series of murders by Jack the Ripper.
